title: Something like Archer
content:
Hi everyone. I am looking for a face similar to [Archer](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906195841/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/font_styles.php?productLineID=100033) Italic. I love the whimsical aesthetic, with the curved serif’s, but I’ve been unable to find anything remotely similar.

You may ask, why not just use Archer? Good question, the client is unable to dish out $300 for the package. So budget is an obstacle (what else is new, right?).

Any help would be fantastic. Thanks so much.

 [‹ Ordinal Baseline](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906195841/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46887 "Go to previous forum topic") [Baskerville Variation? (larger x-height, etc) ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906195841/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46576 "Go to next forum topic")
author: ohokay

comments.content: Maybe Parry Grotesque, or Sutro or [Belizio](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906195841/http:/fontbureau.com/fonts/Belizio). And [Oxtail](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906195841/http:/www.psyops.com/html/spec_oxtail.html)’s a bit funkier.

All great suggestions. A little further afield: [FF Elementa](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906195841/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff_elementa/) and [LTC Law Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906195841/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/lanston_type/ltc_law_italic_regular/).

How could I forget [Neutraface](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906195841/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=615&subpage=neutra_view_all_fonts)’s italic, which has a very similar structure sans the serifs.

Fantabular  
 [http://www.mvbfonts.com/html/fonts/fantabular/pk\_fantabular.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906195841/http:/www.mvbfonts.com/html/fonts/fantabular/pk_fantabular.htm "http://www.mvbfonts.com/html/fonts/fantabular/pk\_fantabular.htm")

perhaps it go on sale soon too

<cite>the client is unable to dish out $300 for the package.</cite>

FYI: You can get 10 styles (from Light to Bold, all with Italics) for $199: [Archer 1 Basic Package](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906195841/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/font_styles.php?productLineID=100033&cpuCount=1&itemID=200077).
